description: Defines the 'Book' model class with properties for book details, a factory constructor for JSON deserialization, and a method for formatted price display.

classes.name: Book
classes.description: A data model representing a book, including identifiers, title, author, description, cover image URL, currency, price in cents, and optional rating. Supports JSON deserialization and formatted price display.

methods.name: Book.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a 'Book' instance from a JSON map, parsing and assigning relevant fields.

methods.name: priceFormatted
methods.description: A getter that returns the book's price as a localized string based on currency.
